Entries.100480003/f Clint 1750/e 101: none/7 14/farmer 5 19 0 Clint 3 13 2/skippable/pause 500/speak Clint "Oh @! Perfect timing... I actually wanted to talk to you."/pause 250/move Clint 0 -1 0/pause 175/move Clint 2 0 2/pause 175/move farmer 0 -5 0/speak Clint "Well... I went on a date with Emily."/pause 500/speak Clint "It was everything I thought I wanted..."/pause 250/speak Clint "But...$2"/pause 250/speak Clint "I just wasn't happy on the date. I didn't feel comfortable and it just didn't feel right..."/pause 250/speak Clint "Am I crazy? As much as I like her... I don't think that things would work out romantically between us.$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 3/pause 250/speak Clint "*sigh*$2"/pause 250/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 250/speak Clint "Uhm... Thank you. For listening to me and all that stuff..."/pause 175/speak Clint "I'm... Luck to have you as a friend.$8"pause 500/end
Entries.100480010/f Clint 2000/e 100480007: none/7 14/farmer 5 19 0 Clint 3 13 2/skippable/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 150/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 150/move farmer 0 -2 0/showFrame Clint 51/emote Clint 40/speak Clint "...Hey @.$11"/pause 500/speak Clint "H-Huh? Yeah... I'm okay. I just realized something recently."/pause 250/showFrame Clint 12/speak Clint "I... Have no idea what I want to do with my life.$2"/pause 250/speak Clint "I don't know what I want to do. I don't know where. I don't know with who.$2"/pause 250/speak Clint "I just... Feel so lost.$11"/pause 250/showFrame Clint 51/emote Clint 40/speak Clint "I don't know what to do.$2"/pause 250/showFrame Clint 0/speak Clint "I uhm... Sorry. I'll be okay...$2"/addConversationTopic MC_LostClint/end
Entries.100480009/f Clint 500: none/7 14/farmer 5 19 0 Clint 3 13 2/skippable/showFrame Clint 51/emote Clint 12/pause 250/showFrame Clint 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 150/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 150/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Clint "Oh, uh. Hey @. It's... Nice seeing you again."/pause 250/showFrame Clint 12/speak Clint "I uh... Should warn you that I'm not good around people. It's not personal or anything...$2"/pause 250/showFrame Clint 0/speak Clint "I just get... Nervous and awkward aroud people, no matter what I do.$11"/pause 250/speak Clint "I'm sorry. I uh... Hope you still come visit, even it's just to upgrade your tools."/end
Entries.100480012/f Clint 3000/e 100480010: none/7 14/farmer 5 19 0 Clint 5 16 0/skippable/pause 500/emote Clint 40/pause 250/emote farmer 8/pause 250/emote Clint 16/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "Oh! Hey. I was just thinking about this place."/pause 250/faceDirection Clint 0/speak Clint "I'm so glad I don't have to come here every day.$1"/pause 250/speak Clint "Now I spend most of my time on a farm, doing things that I actually want to! Even when I don't really know what that is..."/pause 250/speak Clint "Thanks for getting me out of here. You're the best."/end

Entries.100480007/e 100480008/d Mon Tue Thu Fri: none/14 12/farmer 12 20 0 Clint 12 12 0/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/faceDirection Clint 2/emote Clint 16/speak Clint "@! Y-You have really good timing..."/pause 150/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 150/speak Clint "I-I have my appointment today... I know I have to do this... But I'm scared.$11"pause 250/speak Clint "I really hope Harvey's right about all this..."/pause 150/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 3/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "Well uhm. I don't want to waste too much of your time, I'll be going. Thanks for being here for me."/pause 150/move Clint 0 -3 0/end invisible Clint/addConversationTopic MC_AfterTherapy/end
Entries.100480011/f Clint 2500/e 100480003: none/16 23/farmer 2 23 1 Clint 13 23 3/skippable/move Clint -3 0 3/pause 250/emote Clint 16/speed Clint 5/pause 250/move Clint 2 0 1/emote farmer 8/shake Clint 1000/speak Clint "*sigh*$2"/pause 250/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "U-Uh hey @! I was on my way to come visit you..."/pause 250/speak Clint "...I'm getting some major déjà vu.$2"/pause 250/move Clint -8 0 3/speak Clint "...But this time I'm going to be brave and be clear!$1"/pause 250/speak Clint "Would you like to...$4"/pause 250/speak Clint "Go on a date with me?$4"/end

Entries.100480008/f Clint 1250/e 100480004: Hospital_Ambient/15 9/farmer 10 12 0 Harvey 14 6 1 Clint 16 6 1/skippable/pause 150/move farmer 0 -5 1/pause 250/speak Harvey "Clint. Listen to me, it's okay to get help...$2"/pause 150/emote Clint 12/speak Clint "I'm okay! I don't need therapy!$3"/pause 150/move farmer 5 0 0/pause 150/faceDirection Harvey 2/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "@? What are you doing here?"/pause 150/faceDirection Harvey 1/speak Harvey "I'm not sure... But I know they agree with me."/faceDirection Clint 3/pause 150/speak Clint "...How would you know?$11"/pause 150/speak Harvey "Clint, it's obvious that you're suffering through something...$2"/pause 150/speak Harvey "We're worried about you."/pause 150/faceDirection Clint 1/emote Clint 28/speak Clint "...Fine! I'll go to one appointment. But if I don't like it, I'm not going back!$2"/pause 150/speak Harvey "Well... It's better than nothing."/end

Entries.100480013/f Clint 3500/f Leah 1500/e 100: none/8 6/farmer 7 9 0 Clint 6 5 0 Leah 8 5 3/skippable/pause 150/emote Clint 12/speak Clint "Why can't I get the colors right...$3"/pause 150/speak Leah "Don't worry, you'll get it right. It might just take a while!"/pause 150/move farmer 0 -1 3/pause 150/move farmer -1 0 0/speak Leah "You wanted to learn how to paint, right?"/pause 150/speak Clint "...Yeah *sigh*$11"/pause 150/speak Leah "Then relax! You'll get it right, you just need more practice.$1"/pause 150/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "...I'll try$11"/pause 150/emote Clint 16 continue/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "@! What are you doing here?$4"/pause 150/emote Leah 8/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "Oh hey @!$1"/pause 150/emote farmer 8/pause 150/speak Leah "Huh? You didn't know that I've been teaching Clint to paint?"/pause 150/emote farmer 40/pause 150/speak Clint "O-Oops...$10"/pause 150/emote farmer 40/pause 150/speak Clint "Well... I was just finding something I actually want to do, and Leah helped.$1"/move Clint 0 1 2/pause 150/speak Clint "I uhm, was waiting to surprise you with a painting... But I guess this works too!$1"/end

Entries.2123243/e 2111194/o Clint/k 100480001 10: EmilyTheme/-1000 -1000/farmer -2000 -2000 0 Emily 7 6 2 Lewis 3 7 1 Clint 11 9 3 Shane 8 8 0 Abigail 7 8 0 Robin 2 9 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite ClothingTherapy/viewport 5 7 true/pause 2000/speak Emily "Welcome to clothing therapy!"/faceDirection Abigail 1/emote Robin 8 true/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 0/faceDirection Abigail 0/pause 500/speak Emily "You're probably wondering... what is clothing therapy?#$b#I'll try to explain."/move Emily 0 1 2/speak Emily "So many of us are struggling with personal issues... things holding us back from living how we want.$u#$b#It's important to me that everyone has a free and happy life... so I came up with a new kind of therapy to help people achieve that.$u"/move Emily 0 -1 2/pause 500/speak Emily "It's based on the amazing power of self-expression. Self-expression is a wonderful healing tool, did you know that?"/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 1000/speak Emily "Behind this curtain, you'll find racks and racks of clothes. There's endless options to choose from."/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Emily "Your job is simple: find the outfit that truly speaks to you, and put it on.#$b#Feel confident in yourself and your choice. You all have a unique style to share with the world!#$b#Shane, you're up first!$h"/specificTemporarySprite curtainOpen/pause 1500/showFrame Shane 18/jump Shane/pause 1400/showFrame Shane 0/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "Okay"/move Shane 0 -1 0/move Shane -3 0 0/move Shane 0 -2 2/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite curtainClose/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 4 11/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Emily "Ah, @. You're just in time. That's great!#$b#Now, go outside with confidence and show the world!"/pause 1000/emote ClothesTherapyCharacters 40/pause 500/textAboveHead ClothesTherapyCharacters "Sure"/move ClothesTherapyCharacters Entries.831125/f Shane 1750/f Clint 500/f Emily: spring_day_ambient/-100 -100/farmer 30 87 0 Shane 30 81 1 Clint 34 81 1 Emily 35 81 3/skippable/showFrame Shane 16/move farmer 0 -5 1 true/viewport 34 82 true/pause 800/speak Shane "Okay guys, do you remember your lines?$u"/faceDirection Clint 3/pause 300/speak Emily "Yes!"/emote Clint 28/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 500/speak Shane "Ready? Action!$u"/pause 1500/speak Emily "I thought we had something special... I guess I was wrong.$s"/pause 500/speak Clint "I... I... Uh..."/emote Shane 12/playMusic playful/speak Shane "Cut!"/speak Clint "I'm sorry!$s"/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "It's hard to remember my lines when her face is right in front of me like that...$s"/emote Emily 8 true/emote Shane 8/pause 500/showFrame Shane 17/pause 500/jump Shane/pause 800/speak Shane "Oh, hey."/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Shane "Check out my new camera...#$b#Joja Co. is having a video advertisement competition. The prize is 10,000g."/showFrame Shane 16/pause 500/emote Shane 16/showFrame Shane 17/pause 500/speak Shane "Hey! I want you to be in this shot... okay?#$b#Just walk by Clint and Emily in the background while they're talking... It'll give the scene a little more authenticity."/jump farmer/pause 800/move farmer 0 2 1 false/showFrame Shane 16/move farmer 8 0 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "Okay... Ready?#$b#Action!$u"/playMusic sadpiano/speak Emily "I thought we had something special... You said you wouldn't leave me for anything. I guess that was a lie.$s"/move farmer 0 -8 2 true/pause 500/speak Clint "No! It's not like that... This is just something I have to do. It's very important to me."/playMusic none/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 1000/playMusic ragtime/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "I've just got to try new 'Joja Bluu' cola.$a#$b#It's got three times the sorbitol for a thick, sweet blast. And it's cheaper than water!$a"/pause 600/speak Emily "But... But... Isn't soda unhealthy? You promised me...$s"/pause 600/speak Clint "Have no fear, my dear. The world-class science team at Joja Headquarters have determined that 'Joja Bluu' does not cause a significant erosion of the stomach lining. So you can drink it whenever you like, as much as you like.$a#$b#The real question is... 'When will YOU turn bluu?'... *glug* *glug*... Ahh...$a"/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Shane "Cut!"/faceDirection Clint 3/move Shane 3 0 1 false/speak Shane "That was perfect."/move Shane 0 -1 1/faceDirection Clint 2 true/move Shane 5 0 0/speak Shane "Thanks for the help. $h"/move farmer 0 2 2/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 1000/speak Emily "...Clint?$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/playSound coin/showFrame Clint 39/shake Clint 3000/pause 2000/end dialogue Shane "What a productive day... I got some great footage."/end
